switch-policy.description: Enable the layer3 IPv4 static user export host-route or enable the layer3 IPv4 static user export host-route.

any-ip.description: Configure the name of the authentication domain associated with the IP address segment of layer 3 static users.

domain-name.description: Specifies the name of the authentication domain associated with the IP address segment of layer 3 static users.

subscriber-ips.description: List of network segments. It can't conflict with each other. For example, if the network segment 10.0.0.1 10.0.0.5 exists, the 10.0.0.2 10.0.0.6 cannot be delivered.

subscriber-ip.description: Configure the network segments. It can't conflict with each other. For example, if the network segment 10.0.0.1 10.0.0.5 exists, the 10.0.0.2 10.0.0.6 cannot be delivered.

start-ip-address.description: Specifies the start IP address on the IP address segment where the layer 3 static users reside.

vpn-name.description: Specifies the VPN instance name of layer 3 static users. Public network vpn-name value is '_public_'.

domain-name.description: Specifies the name of the authentication domain associated with the IP address segment of layer 3 static users.

end-ip-address.description: Specifies the end IP address on the IP address segment where the layer 3 static users reside.

subscriber-ipv6s.description: List of network segments. The address type of the IPv6/prefix must be GUA or ULA. It can't conflict with each other. For example, if the network segment 1::1 1::5 exists, the 1::2 1::6 cannot be delivered..

subscriber-ipv6.description: Configure the network segments. The address type of the IPv6/prefix must be GUA or ULA. It can't conflict with each other. For example, if the network segment 1::1 1::5 exists, the 1::2 1::6 cannot be delivered.

start-ipv6-address.description: Specifies the start IP address of the IPv6 network segment where the layer 3 static users reside.

vpn-name.description: Specifies the VPN instance name of layer 3 static users. Public network vpn-name value is '_public_'.

domain-name.description: Specifies the name of the authentication domain associated with the IP address segment of layer 3 static users.

end-ipv6-address.description: Specifies the end IP address of the IPv6 network segment where the layer 3 static users reside.

subscriber-ip-and-ipv6s.description: List of network segments. The address type of the IPv6/prefix must be GUA or ULA. It can't conflict with each other. For example, if the network segment 10.0.0.1 10.0.0.5 exists, the 10.0.0.2 10.0.0.6 cannot be delivered. The number of network segments delivered by the dual-stack IPv4/IPv6/prefix must be the same. For example, the IPv4 delivers the 10.0.0.1 10.0.0.5, and the IPv6 delivers the 2::1 2::5.

subscriber-ip-and-ipv6.description: Configure the network segments. The address type of the IPv6/prefix must be GUA or ULA. It can't conflict with each other. For example, if the network segment 10.0.0.1 10.0.0.5 exists, the 10.0.0.2 10.0.0.6 cannot be delivered. The number of network segments delivered by the dual-stack IPv4/IPv6/prefix must be the same. For example, the IPv4 delivers the 10.0.0.1 10.0.0.5, and the IPv6 delivers the 2::1 2::5.

start-ip-address.description: Specifies the start IP address on the IP address segment where the layer 3 static users reside.

start-ipv6-address.description: Specifies the start IP address of the IPv6 network segment where the layer 3 static users reside.

start-ipv6-prefix.description: Specifies the start IPv6 delegation prefixes of layer 3 static users.

vpn-name.description: Specifies the VPN instance name of layer 3 static users. Public network vpn-name value is '_public_'.

domain-name.description: Specifies the name of the authentication domain associated with the IP address segment of layer 3 static users.

end-ip-address.description: Specifies the end IP address on the IP address segment where the layer 3 static users reside.

end-ipv6-address.description: Specifies the end IP address of the IPv6 network segment where the layer 3 static users reside.

end-ipv6-prefix.description: Specifies the end IPv6 delegation prefixes of layer 3 static users.

subscriber-subnets.description: List of IP address segments for layer 3 static users. The name of the authentication domain associated with the IP address segment.

subscriber-subnet.description: Configure an IP address segment for layer 3 static users and the name of the authentication domain associated with the IP address segment.

start-ip-address.description: Specifies the start IP address on the IP address segment where the layer 3 static users reside.

vpn-name.description: Specifies the VPN instance name of layer 3 static users. Public network vpn-name value is '_public_'.

mask-length.description: Specifies the mask length for the subnet.

switch-policy.description: Enable the layer3 IPv4 static user export host-route or enable the layer3 IPv4 static user export host-route.
